title: many attestation errors cause beacon node abort a few times
body:
many beacon node error like this: 
Could not receive attestation in chain service error=target epoch 178 does not match current epoch 180 or prev epoch 179
could not process attestation from fork choice service

[2020-01-10 19:15:43] ERROR validator: Could not request attestation to sign at slot 5760: rpc error: code = DeadlineExceeded desc = context deadline exceeded
[2020-01-10 19:18:36] ERROR validator: Could not report validator's rewards/penalties error=rpc error: code = DeadlineExceeded desc = context deadline exceeded slot=5792

<beacon node runs only about half hour, then abort on this error >

[2020-01-10 19:21:12] ERROR blockchain: Could not receive attestation in chain service error=target epoch 179 does not match current epoch 181 or prev epoch 180
could not process attestation from fork choice service
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(Service).ReceiveAttestationNoPubsub
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_attestation.go:34
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(Service).processAttestation
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_attestation.go:81
runtime.goexit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1357 targetRoot=0xc6ce61f2fce6a857780b029752e63bee468e3dfd5f023d386ac25b8e83216b67

environment: docker

latest chain error:

[2020-01-10 19:40:33] ERROR blockchain: Could not receive attestation in chain service error=target epoch 182 does not match current epoch 184 or prev epoch 183
could not process attestation from fork choice service
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).ReceiveAttestationNoPubsub
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_attestation.go:34
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).processAttestation
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_attestation.go:81
runtime.goexit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1357 targetRoot=0x292dc79f404a5f1681122989b35fe55470a565e7914c594480359581847c0f33

Abort again, 10 minutes ago:

[2020-01-10 20:15:51]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=26 deposits=0 slot=6079
[2020-01-10 20:16:14]  INFO forkchoice: Executing state transition on block root=0xb2425831... slot=6081
[2020-01-10 20:16:27]  INFO sync: Requesting parent block currentSlot=6082 parentRoot=b2425831fd32b2a35e817077061114f190c7681bab1a7f7699de29b848a2e357
[2020-01-10 20:16:31]  INFO sync: Requesting parent block currentSlot=6082 parentRoot=b2425831fd32b2a35e817077061114f190c7681bab1a7f7699de29b848a2e357
[2020-01-10 20:16:35]  INFO sync: Requesting parent block currentSlot=6082 parentRoot=b2425831fd32b2a35e817077061114f190c7681bab1a7f7699de29b848a2e357
[2020-01-10 20:16:39]  INFO sync: Requesting parent block currentSlot=6082 parentRoot=b2425831fd32b2a35e817077061114f190c7681bab1a7f7699de29b848a2e357
[2020-01-10 20:16:43]  INFO sync: Requesting parent block currentSlot=6082 parentRoot=b2425831fd32b2a35e817077061114f190c7681bab1a7f7699de29b848a2e357
[2020-01-10 20:16:47]  INFO forkchoice: Executing state transition on block root=0xb2425831... slot=6081
[2020-01-10 20:18:27] ERROR sync: Failed to handle p2p pubsub error=context deadline exceeded
could not process slot
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/core/state.ExecuteStateTransition
        beacon-chain/core/state/transition.go:61
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain/forkchoice.(*Store).OnBlock
        beacon-chain/blockchain/forkchoice/process_block.go:84
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).ReceiveBlockNoPubsub
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_block.go:73
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).beaconBlockSubscriber
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber_beacon_blocks.go:51
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).subscribeWithBase.func1
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber.go:147
runtime.goexit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1357
could not execute state transition
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain/forkchoice.(*Store).OnBlock
        beacon-chain/blockchain/forkchoice/process_block.go:86
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).ReceiveBlockNoPubsub
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_block.go:73
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).beaconBlockSubscriber
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber_beacon_blocks.go:51
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).subscribeWithBase.func1
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber.go:147
runtime.goexit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1357
could not process block from fork choice service
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).ReceiveBlockNoPubsub
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_block.go:74
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).beaconBlockSubscriber
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber_beacon_blocks.go:51
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).subscribeWithBase.func1
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber.go:147
runtime.goexit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1357 topic=/eth2/beacon_block/ssz
PS C:\prysm>
